variables.input: TICF CRI - Staging - 640259204840,TICF CRI - Build - 769837561067,SSF - Staging - 861348360548

fetch dt.entity.service
| filter entity.name == $Lambda
| fieldsRemove entity.name

0.content:
## Fraud TICF CRI/SSF Dashboard

This dashboard displays metrics for the TICF CRI or SSF system Staging, Integration and Production environment. For further information on TICF CRI see [here](https://govukverify.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/FPAD/pages/3765012906/Technical+solution).

2.title: Gateway Request Latency
2.query:
timeseries { avgLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion = avg(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion, default: 0), 
maxLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion = max(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion, default: 0),
minLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion = min(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion, default: 0) }, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, union: true
| fieldsRename `Avg Latency` = avgLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion
| fieldsRename `Max Latency` = maxLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion
| fieldsRename `Min Latency` = minLatencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion
| limit 100

3.title: Gateway HTTP Errors
3.query:
timeseries { Errors4xx = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage, default: 0), 
Errors5xx = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage, default: 0)}, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, 
union: true

4.title: Gateway Requests and Latencies (all gateways)
4.query:
timeseries { countByAccountIdApiNameRegion = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.countByAccountIdApiNameRegion), latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion = avg(cloud.aws.apigateway.latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion) }, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, 
union: true
| fieldsAdd Count = arraySum(countByAccountIdApiNameRegion)
| fieldsAdd Latency = arrayAvg(latencyByAccountIdApiNameRegion)
| fieldsRename `API Name` = apiname

5.title: 4XX Errors at Gateway by Endpoint
5.query:
timeseries `4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage` = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage), 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }
| fieldsAdd `4XX Error Count` = arraySum(`4xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage`)
| fieldsRename `API Name` = apiname
| sort `4XX Error Count` desc

6.title: 5XX Errors at Gateway by Endpoint
6.query:
timeseries `5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage` = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage), 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }
| fieldsAdd `5XX Error Count` = arraySum(`5xxErrorByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage`)
| fieldsRename `API Name` = apiname
| sort `5XX Error Count` desc

7.title: Requests Blocked by WAFS (all WAFs)
7.query:
timeseries blockedRequestsByAccountIdRegionRuleWebACL = sum(cloud.aws.wafv2.blockedRequestsByAccountIdRegionRuleWebACL), 
by: { aws.region, aws.account.id, rule, webacl, region }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }
| fieldsAdd Count = arraySum(blockedRequestsByAccountIdRegionRuleWebACL)
| fieldsRename `Region` = aws.region
| fieldsRename `Account` = aws.account.id
| fieldsRename `Rule` = rule
| fieldsRename `Web ACL` = webacl
| sort Count desc

25.title: Invocations

26.title: Total Invocations

27.title: Duration

28.title: Concurrent Executions

29.title: Error Rate

30.title: Error Count

31.title: Throttles

32.title: $Lambda - Request Count & Latency (p50, p90, p95, p99)

34.title: Gateway Request Count
34.query:
timeseries { countByAccountIdApiName = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.countByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage, default: 0) }, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == $SelectedAWSAccount }, union: true
| fieldsRename `Count` = countByAccountIdApiName
| limit 100

dt.statistics.ui.anomaly_detection.Stati.query:
timeseries { countByAccountIdApiName = sum(cloud.aws.apigateway.countByAccountIdApiNameRegionStage, default: 0) }, 
by: { apiname }, 
filter: { aws.account.id == "640259204840" }, union: true
| fieldsRename `Count` = countByAccountIdApiName
| limit 100

39.title: Recursive Executions Dropped

40.title: Async Event Age

41.title: Async Events Received

42.title: Iterator Age

44.title: Throttled Requests

45.title: Read Throttle Events

46.title: Write Throttle Events

47.title: Consumed Read Capacity

48.title: Consumed Write Capacity

51.description: Total number of successful user registration requests

52.title: Sign In Successes
52.description: Provides the total number of successful user authentication requests

58.title: Throttle Count

59.title: Call Count

65.title: Request Latency

66.title: SQS Oldest Message & Number sent
66.query:
/*
Warning:
 - DQL does not support total value mode, the resulting value may diverge from the result from classic metrics.
*/
timeseries { approximateAgeOfOldestMessageByAccountIdQueueNameRegion = sum(cloud.aws.sqs.approximateAgeOfOldestMessageByAccountIdQueueNameRegion), numberOfMessagesSentByAccountIdQueueNameRegion = sum(cloud.aws.sqs.numberOfMessagesSentByAccountIdQueueNameRegion) }, by: { queuename }, filter: { (aws.account.id == "260731919125") AND (contains(queuename, "shared-signals")) }, union: true
| fieldsAdd approximateAgeOfOldestMessageByAccountIdQueueNameRegion = arraySum(approximateAgeOfOldestMessageByAccountIdQueueNameRegion)
| sort approximateAgeOfOldestMessageByAccountIdQueueNameRegion desc
| fieldsAdd numberOfMessagesSentByAccountIdQueueNameRegion = arraySum(numberOfMessagesSentByAccountIdQueueNameRegion)

68.title: Messages Sent
68.query: timeseries { max(cloud.aws.sqs.numberOfMessagesSentByAccountIdQueueNameRegion), value.A = avg(cloud.aws.sqs.numberOfMessagesSentByAccountIdQueueNameRegion, scalar: true) }, by: { queuename, aws.account.id }, filter: { ( matchesValue(queuename, "*ssf-main*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*inbound-ssf*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*ticf-cri*") ) AND matchesValue(`aws.account.id`, "861348360548") }

69.title: Messages Received
69.query: timeseries { max(cloud.aws.sqs.numberOfMessagesReceivedByAccountIdQueueNameRegion), value.A = avg(cloud.aws.sqs.numberOfMessagesReceivedByAccountIdQueueNameRegion, scalar: true) }, by: { queuename }, filter: { ( matchesValue(queuename, "*ssf-main*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*inbound-ssf*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*ticf-cri*") ) AND matchesValue(`aws.account.id`, "861348360548") }

70.title: Messages Visible
70.query: timeseries { max(cloud.aws.sqs.approximateNumberOfMessagesVisibleByAccountIdQueueNameRegion), value.A = avg(cloud.aws.sqs.approximateNumberOfMessagesVisibleByAccountIdQueueNameRegion, scalar: true) }, by: { queuename }, filter: { ( matchesValue(queuename, "*ssf-main*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*inbound-ssf*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*ticf-cri*") ) AND matchesValue(`aws.account.id`, "861348360548") }

71.title: Messages Not Visible
71.query: timeseries { avg(cloud.aws.sqs.approximateNumberOfMessagesNotVisibleByAccountIdQueueNameRegion), value.A = avg(cloud.aws.sqs.approximateNumberOfMessagesNotVisibleByAccountIdQueueNameRegion, scalar: true) }, by: { queuename }, filter: { ( matchesValue(queuename, "*ssf-main*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*inbound-ssf*") OR matchesValue(queuename, "*ticf-cri*") ) AND matchesValue(`aws.account.id`, "861348360548") }

leftYAxisSettings.label: Approximate Number Of Messages Not Visible
